mapper.select: SELECT t1.sale_id, t2.id, t2.product_name, t2.product_content, t2.product_price, t3.product_pic, t2.product_status, t2.product_tag, t2.product_create_time, t4.user_id AS userId , t4.user_name AS userName, t4.header_picture AS userHeaderPicture FROM user_sale t1 LEFT JOIN product t2 ON t1.product_id = t2.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT pic.pid, product_pic FROM product_pic pic GROUP BY pic.pid ) t3 ON t2.id = t3.pid LEFT JOIN sys_user t4 ON t1.buyer_id = t4.user_id WHERE t1.uid = #{userId} and t2.is_deleted=1 ORDER BY t2.create_time DESC
